com.noelios.restlet.connector
Class HttpClient

java.lang.Object
  org.restlet.connector.AbstractConnector
      com.noelios.restlet.connector.HttpClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
Client, Connector, Element, UniformInterface
public class HttpClient
extends AbstractConnector
implements Client

HTTP client based on J2SE 5.0 HttpURLConnection class.
